name: Awesome Cookie Dough Chef Dessert Food Treat Maker
name_original: Awesome Cookie Dough Chef Dessert Food Treat Maker
description:
Who's ready to make some Cookies!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you another best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite cookie recipes. Play and make your own today!

Features:
- Choose your favorite flavors
- Mix ingredients, roll your dough
- Choose your cookie cutter: regular, gingerbread, heart, square, star
- Decorate your cupcake
- BAKE AND EAT IT AND EAT IT AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Cookie Cutters
- Flavors
- Decorations: Creams, frosting, candies, sprinkles
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself. Who doesnt like to bake for the sweet tooth!

Download Awesome Cookie Dough Chef Dessert Food Treat Maker right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Cookie Dough Chef Dessert Food Treat Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
